parameter.name: fadetime
parameter.label: Fade time
parameter.description: Fade time in ms for changing values

parameter.name: dimtime
parameter.label: Dim time
parameter.description: Time in ms for dimming from 0-100%

parameter.name: turnonvalue
parameter.label: Turn-On value(s)
parameter.description: Format is "value[, value, ...]". If less values than channels are defined, they are reused from the beginning.

parameter.name: turnoffvalue
parameter.label: Turn-Off value(s)
parameter.description: Format is "value[, value, ...]". If less values than channels are defined, they are reused from the beginning.

parameter.name: dynamicturnonvalue
parameter.label: Dynamic Turn-On Value
parameter.description: If enabled, values are stored on OFF command and restored on ON command
